Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The impact of deafness on individual, family and social problems in the deaf community and culture, including historical and changing attitudes toward persons and disabilities.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Conversation. Emphasis on refining fluency receptively and expressively. Practicum with the deaf community.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study in complex grammar, facial expression, metaphorical and idiomatic vocabulary, emphasizing production of non-voiced, conversational, spontaneous signed sentences, "reading" signed phrases and sentences.
